p: Each model depicts the historic and targeted VMMC scale-up patterns slightly differently, due to differences in model structure, parameters and demographic inputs. However, the patterns of VMMCs achieved in the past and targeted for the future ( Fig 1A; details in S3, S4 and S5 Files) and resulting MC coverage over time ( Fig 1B, e.g. 28% in 2016) are broadly in agreement with the program data and targets [ 27].
